examples: annoyed with somebody at/about something He was beginning to get very annoyed with me about my carelessness.
annoyed at/about something I was a little annoyed about the whole thing.
annoyed with somebody I was a bit annoyed with him.
I was annoyed with myself for giving in so easily.
I bet she was annoyed at having to write it out again.
annoyed that… I was annoyed that they hadn't turned up.
annoyed to find, see, etc. He was annoyed to find himself going red.
I was annoyed by her remarks.
We enjoyed the game but were rather annoyed at being beaten.
He tried to ignore the annoyed looks from the other customers.
